document_data.name: Shining Knight Arms & Armor
document_data.mainbody: '''Shining Knight Arms & Armor''' was an armory shop located in [[Neverwinter]] in the 14{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It was located to the southwest of the [[House of Knowledge (Neverwinter)|House of Knowledge]], in the [[City Core (Neverwinter)|City Core]] district.
document_data.Description: The Shining Knight was one of the best armories in Neverwinter, because its owner was a [[wizard]] who knew spells to help him to shape metal, and who also worked with [[dwarves]] to create good weapons and armor.
